code: import{getAuth}from"firebase/auth";import firebase from'firebase/compat/app';import'firebase/compat/auth';import'firebase/compat/firestore';var firebaseConfig={apiKey:process.env.REACT_APP_API_KEY,authDomain:process.env.REACT_APP_AUTH_DOMAIN,projectId:process.env.REACT_APP_PROJECT_ID,storageBucket:process.env.REACT_APP_STORAGE_BUCKET,messagingSenderId:process.env.REACT_APP_MESSAGING_SENDER_ID,appId:process.env.REACT_APP_APP_ID,measurementId:process.env.REACT_APP_MEASUREMENT_ID};var app=firebase.initializeApp(firebaseConfig);export var auth=getAuth(app);export var db=app.firestore();export default app;
